pages.text: Balanced Nutrition$(br2)You have to eat a variety of Food to stay healthy.$(br2)If you eat only 1 or 2 sorts of dishes you get less and less food out of it.

pages.title: Wild Plants
pages.text: $(br)All over the planet you can find these.$(br2)Harvest them with your Hand, or even better with a Knife to get more outcome.

pages.title: Overweight Crops
pages.text: $(br)Most of these ones can be harvested with a hoe.
$(br)You can break the coconut shell`s of them to get Coconuts.

pages.title: Other Animals
pages.text: $(br)Butcher vanilla animals as normal for a good starter supply

pages.title: Fishing Supply Crates
pages.text: $(br)If you decide to fish in these biomes:$(br)$(li)River$(li)Forest$()$(br2)You have a chance to find supply crates where one of them could be a food supply crate.
